text: is an action shoot 'em up 3D video game, published by Playism and developed by Edelweiss, for PlayStation 4, Microsoft Windows and Nintendo Switch. ==References== Category:2014 video games Category:Action video games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:Video games about mecha Category:Nintendo Switch games Category:Shoot 'em ups Category:Video games featuring female antagonists Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Windows games
title: Astebreed
